name: The Cleaner (mateusculpo)
description:
Your Mission: to survive the untill the time is over, don’t let the toxicity meter grows get to 100%. Collect the cats’ shit to avoid your death. When collecting it, you have a chance to win a cookie, give it to the cats so they stop shitting all over the map.^

Commands (Keyboard and Mouse):

  • Movement: (A, W, S, D)
  • Collect the shit and give cookies (J or Left Mouse Button)
  • Has joystick support (if you want to)

PS.: Remember… The more shit spreaded on the map, the sooner you’ll lose. Have fun!

Code by : @mateusculpo Art/Animation : Maxwell Tristão Animation/GameDesigner: Rafael Fujii

TileMap - HUmblePack. Audio - Freesound/HumblePack. Engine - Unity 3D
